content.title: Recruitment of Junior Research Fellow (JRF) for the research project funded by NTFP-NCE, Govt. of Tripura

project_details.title: Microbial assessment for developing inoculums for artificially infecting agarwood tree for sustainable agar cultivation in Tripura and the north-east region
project_details.principal_investigator: Dr. Srimanta Ray, Dept. of Chemical Engg.

emoluments.without_NET_GATE: INR 15,500/- Year 1&2 and INR 17,500/- Year 3 onwards
emoluments.with_NET_GATE: INR 31,000/- Year 1&2 and INR 35,000/- Year 3 onwards

qualifications.essential: First Class Master's Degree in Life Science/ Biotechnology/ Microbiology/ Botany/ Biochemistry or any other allied subjects with hands-on skill/knowledge of Microbial isolation and characterization and Molecular Biology/ Biotechnological Techniques.
desirable: Publications in Scopus/SCI indexed journals in the related field.
Willingness for field visits and travelling, if needed.

content.responsibilities: Developing inoculums for artificially infecting agarwood tree for agar cultivation.

interview.mode: Online (Reporting Time and Link will be informed by email)
interview.venue: NIT Agartala, National Institute of Technology Agartala, Barjala, Jirania, West Tripura, Pin:- 799046

terms_conditions: The position is temporary and governed by NIT Agartala Research & Consultancy Cell rules.
Candidates must ensure eligibility before appearing for the interview.
Applications must include filled form, annexures, educational qualifications, research publications, experience, relevant skills, and statement of interest. Deadline: 10.01.2024.
Applications should be sent as a single PDF to Dr. Srimanta Ray at srimanta.chemical@nita.ac.in.
No TA/DA for interview or joining.
Online candidates must bring all documents and originals for verification upon joining.
Only shortlisted candidates will be informed via email; engagement letter sent upon selection.
Applicants are responsible for authenticity of information.
Institute reserves the right to cancel recruitment at any time.
Appointment is temporary; continuation depends on annual performance appraisal.
Position co-terminus with project duration; two months' notice required if leaving early.
Selected candidate may opt to register for PhD at Dept. of Chemical Engineering, NIT Agartala, subject to eligibility.
